sentences.english: The country is only five years older than me. Its grey hairs have not yet begun to show.

sentences.english: The US declared that the  eagle was its national bird in 1782.
His white hair was in sharp contrast to (with) his dark skin.

sentences.english: Take care of me when I get old; you too will get old.

sentences.english: We know that [the eagles] have always fed on dead marine animals.
